title: Can't buy cheap runes anymore
body:
It says I have the max amount for this item, even when I most certainly do not.

Any help?

Also if it's that I have the max amount of runes in general for an account, how do I remove my tier 1/2 runes to make enough space for the tier 3 ones?

Thanks

replies.body:
Due to the way the rune inventory is coded, you're only allowed a certain amount of total runes regardless of tier. No worries though, if you still want we can remove those tier 1/2 runes for you! 

Shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) telling us that you need your Tier 1/2 runes removed and we can make that happen ^_^!
